review: Good device, it is not as fast as the fire TV but it works as good as it. I installed many applications and all of them where compatible. I would definitely recommend it. The only unexpected thing was that the device used an alternate power source, so you need to have an additional power outlet for that.
author: Pablo Lopez

review: I like the ease of use and that I can get to both my Prime and Netflix accounts. My complaint is that it doesn't hold a charge so unless you buy ANOTHER accessory, you have a cord visible down your wall. Most of us these days have tvs mounted on the wall and plan so that no cords show so we certainly don't want a cord to show for this either.
